Sentence.value: The skin incision was closed with surgical tape.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[skin incision|C0191279]] was closed with [[surgical tape|C0183837]].

Sentence.value: To prevent this: - Eat healthy foods, exercise (if your provider advises you to), stop smoking (if you smoke), and reduce your stress level.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: To prevent this: - Eat healthy foods, [[exercise|C0015259]] (if your provider advises you to), stop smoking (if you smoke), and reduce your [[stress|C0038435]] level.

Sentence.value: - If you are taking medicines for high blood pressure or diabetes, take them the way you have been told to take them.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - If you are taking [[medicines|C0013227]] for [[high blood pressure|C0020538]] or [[diabetes|C0011847]], take them the way you have been told to take them.

Sentence.value: - You may be instructed to take aspirin and/or a medicine called clopidogrel (Plavix), or another medicine when you go home.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - You may be instructed to take aspirin and/or a medicine called [[clopidogrel|C0070166]] ([[Plavix|C0633084]]), or another medicine when you go home.
